title: Laos - Credit Rating
description: Moody's credit rating for Laos was last set at Caa3 with stable outlook. Fitch's credit rating for Laos was last reported at N/A with n/a outlook. In general, a credit rating is used by sovereign wealth funds, pension funds and other investors to gauge the credit worthiness of Laos thus having a big impact on the country's borrowing costs. This page includes the government debt credit rating for Laos as reported by major credit rating agencies.
